snippet: President Obama met with Hillary Rodham Clinton at the White House on Monday to discuss the situation in Syria and consult the former secretary of state on a response to the country’s use of chemical weapons.
abstract: President Obama met with Hillary Rodham Clinton at the White House on Monday to discuss the situation in Syria and consult the former secretary of state on a response to the country’s use of chemical weapons.

headline.main: On Syria, Clinton Voices Support for Obama's Policy and for 'Political Solution'
